title: Why are runes so expensive?
body: So I have a fair amount of champions and I have now decided to start saving up for runes. Why are they so damn expensive? It provides an unfair advantage to people who own them vs people who are still buying them. I'm not asking for runes to be free but they could be made cheaper.

replies.body: Runes cost so much to make people buy RP, simple.
Umm.... Since when can RP buy runes?

Personally i don't see why There are 3 tiers for runes. maybe riot should enable all players to use maybe tier one runes just to help level the field between players with all the runes and newer players still grinding to buy them. honestly there is a big difference in match up with certain runes and having 3 tiers ( with 1 and 2 tier being a waste ip (really f**king over new players with pretty little runes)) get them to use tier 1 or 2  for free so they dont need to read a guide or get yelled at by older players

Thanks for your help guys. I've decided to systematically by runes for the champs I like. Top lane duelists are the champs I play the most so I'm gonna focus on getting AD marks first. I still think runes are too expensive but ah well what are you gonna do.

Hey there Summoner,

To put it into perspective. Runes are a way in which players can boost their in-game stats. Runes are like an investment. You have to know what are the best runes for the best price e.g. Yellow Armour instead of Red Armour. To answer your question. Runes are expensive because of the fact I previously stated (that they boost your in-game stats). In all honesty, they are not an unfair advantage over those without runes. Because, at some stage (probably the same stage as you are now) they too would not have had any runes. 

The best way to combat this. 

Find the champions in your niche and then, instead of buying more champions afterwards, save your IP to create about 4 (or if you don't want to get more rune pages) just the 2 default rune pages that are best suited (across the board) for your champion pool. Once you have at least 2 solid rune pages for your champion pool you should be fine.

Just an FYI. I have 2 accounts with max rune pages. I have a shen rune page that is worth 22k IP. But now I have nothing to spend IP on so I just blow it on random runes and combinations. LF>IP gifting option.

Kind Regards,
lols =)

You only really need an AD and AP rune pages. Flat AD runes are cheap. Armour seals are used for both generic pages. You can also use flat or scaling MR runes for both pages as well. Once you complete one page, the other one should be very easy to fill.

Long story short, stop buying champions and start buying runes as soon as level 20.

If you look at all the runes as a whole then sure, they look very expensive. You just need to be smart which ones you buy. A full rune page might set you back around 11k IP. 2 rune pages is all you need to start with, an AD and an AP. So ~22k IP for 2 full sets This might sound like a lot but really it is only 3 6300 IP champions.
